dcterms:description: The Vio-Lens dataset contains YouTube comments related to violent incidents in the Bengal region, with the goal of highlighting potential threats that could incite further violence.
dcterms:title: Vio-Lens Dataset

dcterms:description: The ETHOS dataset is designed to identify hate speech on social media, providing a collection of comments labeled for the presence or absence of hate speech.
dcterms:title: ETHOS Dataset

dcterms:description: SentNoB is designed to capture the sentiment within text, classifying content as positive, negative, or neutral.

dcterms:description: The English Sentiment Analysis dataset consists of tweets annotated for sentiment on 2-, 3-, and 5-point scales with labels positive, negative, and neutral.
dcterms:title: English Sentiment Analysis Dataset

dcterms:description: XL-Sum is a large and varied dataset consisting of 1.35 million pairs of articles and their corresponding summaries, expertly annotated by the BBC.
